source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a street lined with traditional Japanese buildings, where a group of students in school uniforms are gathered outside a shop. As the camera moves forward, two women dressed in traditional kimonos are seen standing and talking in front of the shop. The shop has various signs and advertisements displayed outside, including images of food items. The background features a mountainous landscape under a partly cloudy sky. The camera continues to move forward, focusing on the two women in kimonos and the students outside the shop.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
source_caption_data.final_caption: The video begins with a view of a street lined with traditional Japanese buildings, where a group of students in school uniforms are gathered outside a shop. As the camera moves forward, two women dressed in traditional kimonos are seen standing and talking in front of the shop. The shop has various signs and advertisements displayed outside, including images of food items. The background features a mountainous landscape under a partly cloudy sky. The camera continues to move forward, focusing on the two women in kimonos and the students outside the shop.

bad_caption: The video opens with a view of a city park where several cyclists ride along a paved path lined with palm trees. As the camera pans to the right, a group of children wearing bright orange vests play soccer on a grassy field nearby. Two men in chef uniforms walk past a food truck parked at the edge of the park, carrying trays of pastries. In the distance, a large fountain sprays water into the air beneath a clear blue sky. The camera continues to follow the cyclists as they weave between the trees and pass by the playing children.
